```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(effsize)
library(janitor)
library(tidyr)
library(tidyr)
library(kableExtra)
library(car)
library(ggbeeswarm)
```


```{r}
mack_creek_vert <- readr::read_csv("mack_creek_vertebrates.csv") %>% 
  clean_names()
```



```{r}
mack_creek_dite <- mack_creek_vert %>% 
  filter(species == "DITE") %>% 
  count(year, section)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = mack_creek_dite, aes(x = year, y = n, fill = section)) +
  geom_col() +
  facet_wrap(~section)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = mack_creek_dite, aes(x = year, y = n)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(~section)
```
